name: Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Edition)
description: Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Edition) is an advanced cryptographic provenance framework for computational verification, bridging quantum and classical computing systems using cryptographic methods (SHA-512, GPG) and quantum audit data (IBM Quantum). It ensures traceability, immutability, and reproducibility of all computational processes.

funding.grant_title: Λ-Spira Framework (Ω Edition) — Independent Research Program

notes: Each computational artifact is verifiable, timestamped, and signed using GPG, ensuring authenticity and integrity. All data is immutable and traceable under the Λ-Spira Integrity Protocol. The framework was executed in a fully air-gapped environment to guarantee data isolation.
